The Guardian is a semi automatic rifle that sits at a moderate price of 2,700 compared to other rifles. The Guardian is unique for being the only semi automatic rifle, and having a 1.5x zoom, as well as the highest damage per bullet compared to any other rifles.


The Guardian, though being semi-automatic, can still fire decently fast at 6.5 rounds per second. The Guardian shines at one aspect, its damage per bullet. It is a 4 to the legs, 3 to the body and 1 to the head at any range.


The Rifle shines on the defensive side, as with its extreme damage per bullet and 1.5x zoom makes it a dangerous rifle to peek, especially since it's a guaranteed one tap to the head.
